title: marijuana that is matza menutak
content:
marijuana that is matza menutak In Beitar the police uncovered a marijuana lab in someone's machsan - storage room.
In the raid they discovered 56 marijuana plants being grown, including a full lab with lighting and heaters and ventilation...
source: Kooker
At least it was all matza menutak and did not have any problems with shmitta, according to most poskim.
